replies.msg: I saw them live which was marvelous. The group along with the dancers and acrobats they invited gave a superb performance. The choreography, the lighting, the stage design and the glow sticks were magnificent. It surpassed our expectations. Best concert so far. Yesterday I assigned five hours for practicing their songs on my piccolo, flute, oboe, cor anglais (english horn), clarinet, E-flat clarinet and bass clarinet. I practised with my friends who play glockenspiel, xylophone, marimba, vibraphone, chimes, timpani (kettle-drum) and celesta, all of which have definite pitch. Adding these instruments makes the music more rhythmic. Saxophone, clarinet and bass clarinet are single reed instruments. Oboe, cor anglais, bassoon, contrabassoon have double reed instruments. Flute is a reedless instrument. Saxophone, cor anglais and clarinet are transposing instrumebts.

[TRANS] I want to communicate a word of thanks to everyone who gave me a lot of birthday wishes and consolation on March 9, 2020. Countless people reached me, embraced me warmly and comforted me. I will live well going forward with the deep love and warm consolation.
Those who came from afar at once, and those who shared their sincere heart from faraway.. Please have deep understanding as I cannot meet and say thanks to everyone who I am thankful for. To me and to our family, March 9 will become a day we cannot forget.
Our dad was by my side from the first day I started music as a young child. He would head out first, turn the car engine on and would move for his daughter. Even now, from somewhere, he is moving ahead first for all of us.
I trust that he is watching from a good place and that he will protect us. Lastly, thank you to everyone who worried with us and tried their best and Dad! Taeyeonnie really loves you a lot
